solution_line_template: Wade's points is {games} x {wade_avg_points_per_game} = <<{games}*{wade_avg_points_per_game}={wade_total_points}>>{wade_total_points} after {games} games.
His teammates' points is {teammates_avg_points_per_game} x {games} = <<{teammates_avg_points_per_game}*{games}={teammates_total_points}>>{teammates_total_points} after {games} games.
So, the total score of the whole team is {wade_total_points} + {teammates_total_points} = <<{wade_total_points}+{teammates_total_points}={total_team_score}>>{total_team_score} after five games."
